author: bobcat6146
content: Hi guys. any batch deposit tools for Medalla? Launch Pad is manual

author: bobcat6146
content: in Metamask, one has to click confirm for every validator. 1000 validators require 1000 click.

author: raulj
content: Hey <@!387720149345763329> there are tools like eth2 that allow you to do so

author: raulj
content: ethdo*

author: raulj
content: https://github.com/wealdtech/ethdo

author: bobcat6146
content: great. thanks. let me check

author: raulj
content: it is unlikely someone will send 1000 real deposits, 10 million dollars worth, using metamask

author: raulj
content: For those types of users, there will likely be different instructions and recommended ways of doing so

author: bobcat6146
content: exactly. Hope so
